text: Weekly Team Meeting Reminder. Hi team, just a reminder about our weekly meeting tomorrow at 10 AM in Conference Room B. Please bring your project updates.
Project Deadline Extension. Hello, due to unforeseen delays, the deadline for the current project has been extended to next Friday. Let me know if you have any concerns.
Lunch Plan for Friday. Anyone interested in joining for lunch this Friday at the new Italian place downtown? Let me know by Thursday!
Updated Budget Report. Attached is the updated budget report for Q2. Please review and provide feedback by EOD.
IT Maintenance Scheduled. Dear all, IT will perform system maintenance this weekend. Expect downtime from 10 PM Saturday to 6 AM Sunday.
Welcome New Intern. Please join me in welcoming our new intern, John Doe, who will be working with the marketing team starting Monday.
Holiday Party Invitation. You’re invited to our annual holiday party on Dec 15th at 7 PM. RSVP by Dec 10th.
Password Policy Update. The company is updating its password policy. All employees must reset their passwords by the end of the month.
Feedback on Presentation. Hi Sarah, your presentation was great! Just a few minor suggestions—let’s discuss tomorrow.
Remote Work Approval. Your request for remote work next Tuesday has been approved. Ensure you’re available for the 3 PM call.
Urgent: Verify Your Account Now. Dear user, your account has been flagged for suspicious activity. Click here to verify your credentials immediately: [malicious-link.com]
Invoice Payment Overdue. Hi, this is a final notice for unpaid invoice #4567. Pay now via this link to avoid service disruption: [phishing-link.com]
CEO Request – Confidential. Hi, this is Mark from Finance. The CEO asked me to urgently transfer $10,000 to vendor XYZ. Please process ASAP.
Your Tax Refund is Pending. You are eligible for a $1200 tax refund. Submit your banking details here: [fake-tax-refund.com]
Password Reset Required. We detected unauthorized access to your account. Reset your password immediately: [fake-login-page.com]
Exclusive Investment Opportunity. Limited-time offer! Invest in this high-return scheme with guaranteed 50% profit in 3 months. Reply now!
HR: Your Salary is On Hold. Due to a payroll error, your salary is delayed. Confirm your bank details here: [fake-hr-portal.com]
You’ve Won a Prize! Congratulations! You won an iPhone 15. Claim it now by paying a small shipping fee: [scam-website.com]
Urgent: Update Your Billing Info. Your subscription will be suspended unless you update your credit card details here: [fake-billing-page.com]
Fake IT Support Alert. Our system detected a virus on your computer. Download this antivirus tool immediately: [malware-download.com]
